question: Who won the Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar International Foundation Kerala State award for 2016-17?
explanation: India's youngest chancellor Dileep K Nair, has received Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar International Foundation Kerala State award 2016-17 for his excellent performance in the field of education. He is the Chancellor of the North East Frontier Technical University NEFTU in Arunachal Pradesh.
